content: Rankings can vary depending on the criteria used, and there is no one universally agreed upon ranking for management consulting firms. That being said, in general PwC is considered a large and well-established professional services firm, but may be considered lower ranking compared to some of the other firms listed (e.g. McKinsey, BCG) in terms of their reputation and prestige in the management consulting industry. But please note, this is subjective and varies depending on the sources and the criteria used for ranking.
